ValidationRule.description: Proposal may only be related to either a constituent or organization.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Setup.ucinn_ascendv2__Bypass_Settings__c.ucinn_ascendv2__Bypass_Validation_Rules__c <> TRUE && Account.Name <> null && ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__c <> null && RecordType.DeveloperName = "Proposal" && RecordType.NamespacePrefix = 'ucinn_ascendv2'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A proposal may only be related to either a constituent or an organization.
